name: Dungeon Deathball
description: Turn-based, tactical bloodsport with random elements. Free the slaves and survive the horrors of Dungeon Deathball!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista SP1+ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 80 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7
